#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    ofstream fout;
    string fname, f1, f2;
    long long A, B;
    srand(time(NULL));
    for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++){
        cout << "name = ";
        cin >> fname;
        A = rand() % 1000000000 + 1;
        B = rand() % 1000000000 + 1;
        fout.open((fname + ".in").c_str());
        fout << A << " " << B << endl;
        fout.close();
        fout.open((fname + ".out").c_str());
        fout << A + B << endl;
        fout.close();
    }
    return 0;
}
